metadata.title: SAPM condemns killing of Khan Zeb

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Tribal Affairs and Member of the National Assembly (MNA) Mubarak Zeb Khan condemned the killing of Maulana Khan Zeb, a former National Assembly candidate of the Awami National Party (ANP) from Bajaur. In a post on his official X account on Thursday, he remarked, "Maulana Khan Zeb, who raised a strong voice for peace in Bajaur, was martyred."
